alert.note: Alert for Central Tularosa Basin; Southern Tularosa Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 11 at 4:17AM MST until March 11 at 7:00PM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...In New Mexico, Central Tularosa Basin and Southern Tularosa Basin. In Texas, Western El Paso County and Eastern/Central El Paso County. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 7 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central Tularosa Basin; Southern Tularosa Basin
